text: The 1980 Summer Paralympics took place in Arnhem, Netherlands. 1,973 athletes from 42 countries were at the Games. People with these types of disabilities competed at the games: spinal injury, amputee, blindness, cerebral palsy, and Les Autres. ==References== Category:1980s in the Netherlands Category:Arnhem Category:1980 in sports Category:1980 in Europe
title: 1980 Summer Paralympics
